removed.name: AlignEntryCode
removed.description: aligns entry code to specified value (in bytes)

removed.name: AllowInvokeGeneric
removed.description: accept MethodHandle.invoke and MethodHandle.invokeGeneric as equivalent methods

removed.name: AlwaysInflate
removed.description: (Unstable) Force inflation

removed.name: AnonymousClasses
removed.description: support sun.misc.Unsafe.defineAnonymousClass (deprecated)

removed.name: CICloneLoopTestLimit
removed.description: size limit for blocks heuristically cloned in ciTypeFlow

removed.name: CIFireOOMAtDelay
removed.description: Wait for this many CI accesses to occur in all compiles before beginning to throw OutOfMemoryErrors in each compile

removed.name: CMSOldPLABReactivityCeiling
removed.description: The clamping of the gain in the feedback loop for on-the-fly PLAB resizing during a scavenge

removed.name: CanonicalizeExperimental
removed.description: Canonicalize graph nodes, experimental code

removed.name: CompilationRepeat
removed.description: Number of times to recompile method before returning result

removed.name: EnableMethodHandles
removed.description: support method handles (deprecated)

removed.name: EventLogLength
removed.description: maximum nof events in event log

removed.name: ExitAfterGCNum
removed.description: If non-zero, exit after this GC.

removed.name: FullProfileOnReInterpret
removed.description: On re-interpret unc-trap compile next at CompLevel_fast_compile

removed.name: G1DefaultMaxNewGenPercent
removed.description: Percentage (0-100) of the heap size to use as maximum young gen size.

removed.name: G1DefaultMinNewGenPercent
removed.description: Percentage (0-100) of the heap size to use as minimum young gen size.

removed.name: G1MarkRegionStackSize
removed.description: Size of the region stack for concurrent marking.

removed.name: G1MaxMixedGCNum
removed.description: The maximum desired number of mixed GCs after a marking cycle.

removed.name: G1OldCSetRegionLiveThresholdPercent
removed.description: Threshold for regions to be added to the collection set. Regions with more live bytes that this will not be collected.

removed.name: G1OldReclaimableThresholdPercent
removed.description: Threshold for the remaining old reclaimable bytes, expressed as a percentage of the heap size. If the old reclaimable bytes are under this we will not collect them with more mixed GCs.

removed.name: G1PrintParCleanupStats
removed.description: When true, print extra stats about parallel cleanup.

removed.name: GCOverheadReporting
removed.description: Enables the GC overhead reporting facility

removed.name: GCOverheadReportingPeriodMS
removed.description: Reporting period for conc GC overhead reporting, in ms

removed.name: HPILibPath
removed.description: Specify alternate path to HPI library

removed.name: InitialCompileFast
removed.description: Initial compile at CompLevel_fast_compile

removed.name: InitialCompileReallyFast
removed.description: Initial compile at CompLevel_really_fast_compile (no profile)

removed.name: InlineAtomicLong
removed.description: inline sun.misc.AtomicLong

removed.name: LinkWellKnownClasses
removed.description: Resolve a well known class as soon as its name is seen

removed.name: LogMultipleMutexLocking
removed.description: log locking and unlocking of mutexes (only if multiple locks are held)

removed.name: MethodHandlePushLimit
removed.description: number of additional stack slots a method handle may push

removed.name: OptimizeMethodHandles
removed.description: when constructing method handles, try to improve them

removed.name: PostSpinYield
removed.description: Yield after inner spinning loop

removed.name: PreBlockSpin
removed.description: Number of times to spin in an inflated lock before going to an OS lock

removed.name: PreSpinYield
removed.description: Yield before inner spinning loop

removed.name: PreserveMarkStackSize
removed.description: Size for stack used in promotion failure handling

removed.name: ReadSpinIterations
removed.description: Number of read attempts before a yield (spin inner loop)

removed.name: StressMethodHandleWalk
removed.description: Process all method handles with MethodHandleWalk

removed.name: StressTieredRuntime
removed.description: Alternate client and server compiler on compile requests

removed.name: Tier1CountInvocations
removed.description: Generate code, during tier 1, to update invocation counter

removed.name: Tier1FreqInlineSize
removed.description: max bytecode size of a frequent method to be inlined, tier 1

removed.name: Tier1Inline
removed.description: enable inlining during tier 1

removed.name: Tier1LoopOptsCount
removed.description: Set level of loop optimization for tier 1 compiles

removed.name: Tier1MaxInlineSize
removed.description: maximum bytecode size of a method to be inlined, during tier 1

removed.name: TraceCompileTriggered
removed.description: Trace compile triggered

removed.name: TraceOSRBreakpoint
removed.description: Trace OSR Breakpoint

removed.name: TraceRedundantCompiles
removed.description: Have compile broker print when a request already in the queue is requested again

removed.name: TraceRegionTasksQueuing
removed.description: Trace the queuing of the region tasks

removed.name: TraceTriggers
removed.description: Trace triggers

removed.name: UpdateHotSpotCompilerFileOnError
removed.description: Should the system attempt to update the compiler file when an error occurs?

removed.name: UseFastExceptionHandling
removed.description: Faster handling of exceptions

removed.name: UsePrefetchQueue
removed.description: Use the prefetch queue during PS promotion

removed.name: UseSpinning
removed.description: Use spinning in monitor inflation and before entry

removed.name: ValueStackPinStackAll
removed.description: Pinning in ValueStack pin everything

added.name: AlignVector
added.description: Perform vector store/load alignment in loop

added.name: AlwaysIncrementalInline
added.description: do all inlining incrementally

added.name: ArrayAllocatorMallocLimit
added.description: Allocation less than this value will be allocated using malloc. Larger allocations will use mmap.

added.name: AutoShutdownNMT
added.description: Automatically shutdown native memory tracking under stress situation. When set to false, native memory tracking tries to stay alive at the expense of JVM performance

added.name: CMSEdenChunksRecordAlways
added.description: Whether to always record eden chunks used for the parallel initial mark or remark of eden
added.deprecation:
Obsoleted in JDK14
Expired in JDK15

added.name: CMSParallelInitialMarkEnabled
added.description: Use the parallel initial mark.
added.deprecation:
Obsoleted in JDK14
Expired in JDK15

added.name: CMSPrintEdenSurvivorChunks
added.description: Print the eden and the survivor chunks used for the parallel initial mark or remark of the eden/survivor spaces

added.name: CheckEndorsedAndExtDirs
added.description: Verify the endorsed and extension directories are not used
added.deprecation:
Deprecated in JDK10
Obsoleted in JDK11
Expired in JDK12

added.name: EnableTracing
added.description: Enable event-based tracing
added.deprecation:
Obsoleted in JDK11
Expired in JDK12

added.name: EscapeAnalysisTimeout
added.description: Abort EA when it reaches time limit (in sec)

added.name: ExitEscapeAnalysisOnTimeout
added.description: Exit or throw assert in EA when it reaches time limit

added.name: G1EvacuationFailureALot
added.description: Force use of evacuation failure handling during certain evacuation pauses

added.name: G1EvacuationFailureALotCount
added.description: Number of successful evacuations between evacuation failures occurring at object copying

added.name: G1EvacuationFailureALotDuringConcMark
added.description: Force use of evacuation failure handling during evacuation pauses when marking is in progress

added.name: G1EvacuationFailureALotDuringInitialMark
added.description: Force use of evacuation failure handling during initial mark evacuation pauses

added.name: G1EvacuationFailureALotDuringMixedGC
added.description: Force use of evacuation failure handling during mixed evacuation pauses

added.name: G1EvacuationFailureALotDuringYoungGC
added.description: Force use of evacuation failure handling during young evacuation pauses

added.name: G1EvacuationFailureALotInterval
added.description: Total collections between forced triggering of evacuation failures

added.name: G1HeapWastePercent
added.description: Amount of space, expressed as a percentage of the heap size, that G1 is willing not to collect to avoid expensive GCs.

added.name: G1LogLevel
added.description: Log level for G1 logging: fine, finer, finest

added.name: G1MaxNewSizePercent
added.description: Percentage (0-100) of the heap size to use as default maximum young gen size.

added.name: G1MixedGCCountTarget
added.description: The target number of mixed GCs after a marking cycle.

added.name: G1MixedGCLiveThresholdPercent
added.description: Threshold for regions to be considered for inclusion in the collection set of mixed GCs. Regions with live bytes exceeding this will not be collected.

added.name: G1NewSizePercent
added.description: Percentage (0-100) of the heap size to use as default minimum young gen size.

added.name: G1TraceHeapRegionRememberedSet
added.description: Enables heap region remembered set debug logs

added.name: G1TraceStringSymbolTableScrubbing
added.description: Trace information string and symbol table scrubbing.

added.name: G1VerifyHeapRegionCodeRoots
added.description: Verify the code root lists attached to each heap region.

added.name: G1VerifyRSetsDuringFullGC
added.description: If true, perform verification of each heap region's remembered set when verifying the heap during a full GC.

added.name: IncrementalInline
added.description: do post parse inlining

added.name: InsertEndGroupPPC64
added.description: Insert EndGroup instructions to optimize for Power6.

added.name: LiveNodeCountInliningCutoff
added.description: max number of live nodes in a method

added.name: LoadExecStackDllInVMThread
added.description: Load DLLs with executable-stack attribute in the VM Thread

added.name: LoadPollAddressFromThread
added.description: Load polling page address from thread object (required for per-thread safepoints on platforms != IA64)

added.name: LoopMaxUnroll
added.description: Maximum number of unrolls for main loop

added.name: MaxForceInlineLevel
added.description: maximum number of nested @ForceInline calls that are inlined

added.name: MaxVectorSize
added.description: Max vector size in bytes, actual size could be less depending on elements type

added.name: MaxVirtMemFraction
added.description: Maximum fraction (1/n) of virtual memory used for ergonomicallydetermining maximum heap size

added.name: NativeMemoryTracking
added.description: Native memory tracking options

added.name: ObjectCountCutOffPercent
added.description: The percentage of the used heap that the instances of a class must occupy for the class to generate a trace event.

added.name: OptimizeExpensiveOps
added.description: Find best control for expensive operations

added.name: PowerArchitecturePPC64
added.description: CPU Version: x for PowerX. Currently recognizes Power5 to Power7. Default is 0. CPUs newer than Power7 will be recognized as Power7.

added.name: PrintGCCause
added.description: Include GC cause in GC logging

added.name: PrintIdealNodeCount
added.description: Print liveness counts of ideal nodes

added.name: PrintNMTStatistics
added.description: Print native memory tracking summary data if it is on

added.name: ReoptimizeCallSequences
added.description: Reoptimize code-sequences of calls at runtime.

added.name: ShowHiddenFrames
added.description: show method handle implementation frames (usually hidden)

added.name: StressCompiledExceptionHandlers
added.description: Exercise compiled exception handlers

added.name: TraceLateExpand
added.description: Trace late expand of nodes.

added.name: TraceNewVectors
added.description: Trace creation of Vector nodes

added.name: TraceProfileInterpreter
added.description: Trace profiling at the bytecode level during interpretation. This outputs the profiling information collected to improve jit compilation.

added.name: TraceTraps
added.description: Trace all traps the signal handlerhandles.

added.name: TrapBasedICMissChecks
added.description: Raise and handle SIGTRAP if inline cache miss detected.

added.name: TrapBasedNotEntrantChecks
added.description: Raise and handle SIGTRAP if calling not entrant or zombie method.

added.name: TrapBasedNullChecks
added.description: Generate code for null checks that uses a cmp and trap instruction raising SIGTRAP. This is only used if an access tonull (+offset) will not raise a SIGSEGV.

added.name: TrapBasedRangeChecks
added.description: Raise and handle SIGTRAP if array out of bounds check fails.

added.name: UseAES
added.description: Control whether AES instructions can be used on x86/x64

added.name: UseAESIntrinsics
added.description: use intrinsics for AES versions of crypto

added.name: UseCGroupMemoryLimitForHeap
added.description: Use CGroup memory limit as physical memory limit for heap sizing
added.deprecation:
Deprecated in JDK10
Expired in JDK11

added.name: UseCountLeadingZerosInstructionsPPC64
added.description: Use count leading zeros instructions.

added.name: UseCountedLoopSafepoints
added.description: Force counted loops to keep a safepoint

added.name: UseExtendedLoadAndReserveInstructionsPPC64
added.description: Use extended versions of load-and-reserve instructions.

added.name: UseFastStosb
added.description: Use fast-string operation for zeroing: rep stosb

added.name: UseLoadInstructionsForStackBangingPPC64
added.description: Use load instructions for stack banging.

added.name: UseLockedTracing
added.description: Use locked-tracing when doing event-based tracing
added.deprecation:
Obsoleted in JDK11
Expired in JDK12

added.name: UsePower6SchedulerPPC64
added.description: Use Power6 Scheduler.

added.name: UseRotateAndMaskInstructionsPPC64
added.description: Use rotate and mask instructions.

added.name: UseSIGTRAP
added.description: Allow trap instructions that make use of SIGTRAP. Use this to switch off all optimizations requiring SIGTRAP.

added.name: UseStaticBranchPredictionForUncommonPathsPPC64
added.description: Use static branch prediction hints for uncommon paths.

added.name: UseStaticBranchPredictionInCompareAndSwapPPC64
added.description: Use static branch prediction hints in CAS operations.

added.name: UseTransparentHugePages
added.description: Use MADV_HUGEPAGE for large pages

added.name: VerboseInternalVMTests
added.description: Turn on logging for internal VM tests.

added.name: VerifyAdapterCalls
added.description: Verify that i2c/c2i adapters are called properly

added.name: VerifyConnectionGraph
added.description: Verify Connection Graph construction in Escape Analysis

added.name: VerifyDuringStartup
added.description: Verify memory system before executing any Java code during VM initialization

added.name: VerifyIdealNodeCount
added.description: Verify that tracked dead ideal node count is accurate

added.name: VerifySilently
added.description: Don't print print the verification progress

added.name: WhiteBoxAPI
added.description: Enable internal testing APIs

added.name: ZapMemory
added.description: Write 0x0101... to empty memory. Use this to ease debugging.
